headline: Datadog (DDOG) Hits 4-Year High on Upbeat Guidance
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks on Fire Amid Market Chaos. Datadog Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the best-performing stocks on Thursday. Datadog snapped a three-day losing streak on Thursday to hit a new four-year high, as investors gobbled up shares after raising its revenue growth guidance for full-year 2025. At intra-day trading, the stock jumped […]
